title: Statement by United Union Coalition Regarding the Health Condition of United CEO Oscar Munoz (IBT ...
text: ( Source : IBT - International Brotherhood of Teamsters ) (WASHINGTON) - On behalf of United 's represented employees, we wish United CEO Oscar Munoz a quick and full recovery from the health setback he experienced on Thursday. Our thoughts are
